issue.title: [Java] ExtensionTypeVector should make sure underlyingVector not null
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8305](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8305). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
In ExtensionTypeVector seems not check nullability for underlyingVector, and it will throw exception when it is null in some api like accept/reset/getField etc.

it's better to do null check when create ExtensionTypeVector rather than when really use it.
